The yellow paper is outdated and needs readability and reliability improvements. But it won't be updated by the Ethereum Foundation, for good reason, due to using the KVM,  "the first fully executable formal semantics of the EVM", but can be kept as is for historical purposes, or updated by the community e.g. from my repo.
